mapper.select: SELECT GUL.USR_ID AS USR_ID , ENCRYP_PW AS ENCRYP_PW , USR_NM AS USR_NM , GU.USR_GRP_ID AS USR_GRP_ID , USR_GRP_NM AS USR_GRP_NM FROM GPCL_USR_LOGIN GUL INNER JOIN GPCL_USR GU ON GUL.USR_ID = GU.USR_ID INNER JOIN GPCL_USR_GRP GUG ON GU.USR_GRP_ID = GUG.USR_GRP_ID WHERE GUL.USR_ID = #{username}
